trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_SEQ_00<tab>Y'shtola is ready to move.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_TODO_03<tab>Stand at the destination and examine the murals.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_000<tab>The bag is sealed tight, but I'd rather not keep the bees buzzing about in there longer than we have to.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_010<tab>The Children's settlement is to the west, a place they call Woven Oath.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_011<tab>According to the guard, there is an airway apart from the entrance which leads to the spiders' nests.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_012<tab>If the fates are kind, the way will be clear.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_020<tab>We should move quickly, before any of the Children arrive.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>Up there is the airway. Do you see it?
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_031<tab>A bit far, perhaps, but we should be able to toss the bag through.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_032<tab>Though we should probably loosen the ropes keeping it closed. Enough that it falls open when it lands inside.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_033<tab>May I do the honors?
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_034<tab>That should do it. Now we wait...
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_SCREAM03330_000_035<tab>(-Villager of the Everlasting Dark-)What is that!?
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_SCREAM03330_000_036<tab>(-Villager of the Everlasting Dark-)Bees! By the abyss, they're everywhere!
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_SCREAM03330_000_037<tab>(-Villager of the Everlasting Dark-)Help! Someone help! We have to save the spiders!
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_038<tab>It sounds like our plan is working.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_039<tab>Still, it is quite likely not all were drawn away from their posts.

TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_040<tab>If you should come to blows with the Children, I'll see to it any signs of struggle are concealed. Failing that, I'll create a distraction to buy Y'shtola more time.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_041<tab>Should anyone get past me, it falls to you to guard her.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_042<tab>Your concern is appreciated, but I sincerely doubt it will come to that.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_043<tab>Why do I get the feeling you enjoy the idea of my loafing about bored in the shadows?
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_044<tab>Come now, Thancred. The shadows are a fitting place for a <var 1A 02 /var>Warrior of Darkness<var 1A 01 /var>. Now, if you both are ready?
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_050<tab>Go on. I'll be right behind you.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_060<tab>The Font of Seeing suggests this is a chamber for prayer. At the very least, they would not place this near potential distractions from their worship.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_061<tab>Perhaps the monument is further in.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_070<tab>Yes, this is it.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_071<tab>I will be but a moment. Keep watch of the entryway.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_072<tab>On second thought, would you mind examining the murals on these walls while I look over this?
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_073<tab>At a glance, I can tell they are old. Predating the founding of the Blessed and the Children, in fact.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_074<tab>We're not like to come here a second time. 'Twould behoove us to learn all that we can.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_080<tab>Hmmm... Then what does this mean...?

TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>Examine the murals and take note of what events they may depict. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target a mural and examine it with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_THANCRED_000_100<tab>Good to see my distraction proved successful.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_110<tab>I believe I now have everything needed to finish deciphering the tablet.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_111<tab>Tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, did the murals appear to be of any significance?
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_112<tab>Depictions of heroes? From the age of gods, the Ronkan Empire, and immediately before the Flood.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_113<tab>Very astute observations. Perhaps in another lifetime you could be a curator of antiquities.
TEXT_LUCKMC109_03330_YSHTOLA_000_114<tab>Though it has no bearing on the task at hand, perhaps that knowledge may prove to be of use in the future.
